item.title: Arch Wiki
item.description: The ArchWiki is very helpful for every linux user. It had almost all the solution to problem a first time linux user can have.

item.title: Dual boot linux distro and Windows
item.description: This post in Manjaro forum is a good guide to dual boot

item.title: My Setup
item.description: Hardware I am using a Lenovo laptop (Ideapad 110-15AST). It has a 15.6 inch screen and comes with AMD A9 9400, 8 GB of RAM, a 1 TB hard disk. Its a old laptop but it gets the work done. I have a Asus M1 Pro which I just bought mainly for its 5000 mAh Li-Po battery. Software I use both linux and Windows OS. I use Manjaro Linux (bspwm) and Windows 10.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi I am 1nt3rrupt. This site was created because I wanted to know about static site generator like hugo. I am also using this website to keep note of anything i find useful on the internet. Nothing much to write here.
